user.description: Can log in to TPD and access products and submission.

admin.description: Has access to most settings required to administer TPD on a daily basis. Can add new users, administer permissions and change general application settings. Administrators have full access to all products and submissions.

sysadmin.description: Has full control over TPD - can modify system configuration properties and all application settings, and has full access to all products and submissions. We recommend granting this permission to as few users as possible.

tooltip.group.remove: Remove all explicit permissions for this group
tooltip.user.remove: Remove all explicit permissions for this user
